 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components

Interface Summary
IBoundsList3D IBoundsList3D provides bounding information for three dimensional points.
IMutableVirtualArray This interface adds a method to set all values of a virtual array to one constant value.
IMutableVirtualArray2D This interface defines methods to set values and error values for elements of an IVirtualArray2D.
IMutableVirtualArrayList1D This interface defines methods to set values and error values for elements of an IVirtualArrayList1D.
IPhysicalArray3D This interface extends the ISparseArray3D and IBoundsList3D interfaces to add information about each point's three dimensional volume surrounding the point.
IPhysicalArray3DList This interface extends the ISparseArray3DList and IBounds3DList interfaces to add information about each point's three dimensional volume surrounding the point.
IPointList3D This interface is intended for classes that must store scattered three dimensional points.
IPreserveState This interface is required by any class that uses the ObjectState class to preserve state information.
ISparseArray3D This interface extends IPointList3D to include values for scattered three dimensional points.
ISparseArray3DList This interface is intended for classes that must store scattered three dimensional mappings of data that change through frames.
IViewComponent Any class that implements this interface will interpret and display data in a usable form.
IVirtualArray This interface defines methods common to all virtual arrays, whether or not the values of the virtual array can be changed.
IVirtualArray2D This interface is implemented by classes that can produce a "logical" 2-D array of floats and is used to pass data to viewers and view components.
IVirtualArrayList1D This interface is implemented by classes that can produce a "logical" list of one dimensional functions or histograms, represented by arrays of values.
 

Class Summary
AxisInfo This class groups all of the information about an axis into one object.
BoundsList3D IBoundsList3D provides bounding information for three dimensional points.
IVCTester Simple class to display an image, specified by an IVirtualArray2D or a 2D array of floats, in a frame.
LogScaleColorModel This class maps floating point values to colors.
LogScaleUtil This class logarithmically maps from a source interval [source_min,source_max] to a destination interval [dest_min,dest_max].
ObjectState This class is used to preserve the state of on object.
PhysicalArray3D This objects implements the ISparseArray3D and IBoundsList3D interfaces to add information about each point's three dimensional volume surrounding the point.
PhysicalArray3DList This interface extends the ISparseArray3DList and IBounds3DList interfaces to add information about each point's three dimensional volume surrounding the point.
PointList3D PointList3D stores scattered three dimensional points.
PseudoLogScaleUtil This class logarithmically maps from a source interval [source_min,source_max] to a destination interval [dest_min,dest_max] using pseudo log scaling.
SparseArray3D This object stores scattered three dimensional points.
SparseArray3DList This object stores scattered three dimensional mappings of data that change through frames.
StateFileFilter Filters out .isv (State) files.
ViewerSim This class is a mock viewer to test basic functionality of any IViewComponent2D components.
VirtualArray2D This class puts a wrapper around a 2-D array of floats.
